Disclosure Requirement S1-11 – Social protection
AR 75. Social protection refers to all the measures that provide access to health care and income
support in cases of challenging life events such as the loss of a job, being sick and in need
of medical care, giving birth and raising a child, or retiring and in need of a pension.
